WorkItem.ClosedComment: Exactly.  If you click on the Releases tab and then look for the Releases pane, you'll find a list of active releases.  Just click on the SQL Server 2005 SP2a link and the installers for the sample databases for SQL Server 2005 will appear towards the bottom of the page (you might have to page down).
WorkItem.Description: The msi package contains Sql Server 2008 samples.  Where are the Sql Server 2005 samples?   The Microsoft Download site states to go to the SqlServerSamples site to download the Sql Server 2005 samples.

Comments.Message: Found them under the releases.  The default are the Sql Server 2008 samples.
